Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $800,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable asset at a special price of $950,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality product at a price that is slightly above its perceived value to you, ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. We look forward to your consideration and hope to discuss the details further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
